description: I have loaded enough LiteCoin to buy 2,500 poker chips and my balance has been reduced. I still can not play any game as the software only fails to load anything. Great concept and would like to play but the software needs to actually work and function.
summary: Stalls, never loads and does not work

description:
Worthless, asking for a insane key codes and even if you enter correctly--- denied. Can't even play. 

probably some dumshit algortithm to get your data
summary: CAN'T EVEN GET INTO THE APP

description: Poorly designed software that hides MOST of the screen if it is opened on a monitor that's in portrait instead of the "normal" landscape mode. The "free play" button was disabled. The only things I could click on were "play for crypto" and another button that brought me to a screen that looks like information about the software, but most of the text can't be seen because it's assuming my monitor is wider than it is tall. Can't click on anything, can't put into windowed mode, the only thing I can do is kill the process from a terminal.
summary: Do not open if your monitor is in portrait mode!

description: i love it but slow installing game
When you try to play, the screen just ends up blank. The option to play for free to try playing is disabled. Nice idea and may work in the future but doesn't work at the moment.

This is the first time I've seen a really working, high-quality poker integration on the blockchain. Sorry, on two blockchains! The game "Texas Hold'em" is technically professionally implemented. I got a lot of positive emotions from this app. Very high-quality reliable and economically promising product.
